pullrequest.title: Added a left hand arat world

content.raw:
This pull request will work in these situations:

1. You have only one monitor
1. You specify a gazebo window in `~/.gazebo/gui.ini`

Right now QT is returning the full desktop size (both monitors combined) as the width of Gazebo, even though gazebo starts fullscreen on one of those screen. I'm looking into this problem, but I won't have a solution by Friday.
